definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: The direct calculation method of precision conversion of long range antiship missile is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了远程反舰导弹精度折合的直接推算方法。

sentences.english: The influence of radar stealth technology on the penetration ability of anti-ship missile is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了雷达隐身技术对反舰导弹突防能力的影响。

sentences.english: Centroid jamming is an important means for naval vessels resisting anti-ship missile.
sentences.chinese: 质心干扰是水面舰艇对抗反舰导弹的一种重要手段。

sentences.english: China is building underground submarine pens on Hainan Island and developing antiship missiles.
sentences.chinese: 中国在海南岛建立地下潜艇基地并开发反舰导弹。

sentences.english: The concerned problem about simulation test on design typification of antiship missile are briefly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 简述了反舰导弹设计定型仿真试验的有关问题。

sentences.english: Plus, the latest anti-ship missiles could render them vulnerable to attack.
sentences.chinese: 此外，最新式的反舰导弹使他们更容易受到攻击。

sentences.english: Just one large, high-speed anti-ship missile could put a carrier out of action.
sentences.chinese: 只要一枚大型高速反舰导弹就能让一艘航母瘫痪。

sentences.english: Dilution jamming is an important means for naval vessels resisting anti-ship missile.
sentences.chinese: 质心干扰是水面舰艇对抗反舰导弹的一种重要手段。

sentences.english: The US also will supply 12 advanced Harpoon missiles, plus two mine-hunting ships。
sentences.chinese: 美方还提供了12枚“鱼叉”反舰导弹和2艘猎雷舰。

sentences.english: The US also will supply 12 advanced Harpoon  missiles, plus two mine-hunting ships。
sentences.chinese: 美方还提供了12枚“鱼叉”反舰导弹和2艘猎雷舰。

sentences.english: The damage principle of water barrier against anti-ship missile is analyzed primarily.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对水障对反舰导弹的毁伤机理进行了初步分析。

sentences.english: Fire mode is the important content of anti-ship missiles (ASM)combat application.
sentences.chinese: 射击方式的选择是反舰导弹作战使用的重要内容。

sentences.english: The radar was designed for the fire-control of the anti-ship missile and 100mm main gun targeting.
sentences.chinese: 雷达设计用于反舰导弹和100毫米主炮火控瞄准。

sentences.english: It is difficult for chafftojam coherent radar terminal guided anti-ship missile.
sentences.chinese: 箔条对反舰导弹相参末制导雷达难以产生干扰效果。

definition: anti-missile missile (such as the Patriot Missile)
